text: The flag of Coacalco () It is colored white and the coat of arms in the center. The emblem has a diameter of three-quarters the width of the stripes. The ratio of the flag is 4:7. ==Design and symbolism== Name Color HEX Code White #FFFFFF ===Historical flags=== Flag of Coacalco de Berriozábal (2006? - 2018?).svg|Flag of Coacalco (2006–2013) Bandera de Coacalco de Berriozábal (2013-2015).png|Flag of Coacalco (2013–2015) Bandera de Coacalco de Berriozábal (2016-2018).png|Flag of Coacalco (2015–2018) Bandera de Coacalco de Berriozábal (2019).png|Flag of Coacalco (2019–2021) Bandera de Coacalco de Berriozábal 2022-2024.png|Flag of Coacalco (2022–2024) ==Related pages== * Coacalco de Berriozábal Municipality ==References== Coacalco Coacalco Category:Flags with coats of arms Category:Symbols of Mexico (state)
title: Flag of Coacalco
